name: Pixel Town Online
description:
Pixel Town Online is a free-to-play massively multiplayer online game that takes place in a virtual open world with many different games and activities.

** Customize your own house! ** Create your very own living space using a wide variety of furniture and decorations that are available to you. Throw a party for you and your friends, or everyone in the town to enjoy!

** Personalize your character! ** Check out the awesome hats, boots, gear, hairstyles, and more at the Loose Thread clothing store. Dress your player in whatever way best expresses your own personal style!

** Play Minigames! ** Have a blast trying out one of the many available minigames such as parkour race and bowling. Climb to the top of the leaderboards and earn some awesome prizes!﻿

** Go fishing! ** Head over to the river flowing through Pixel Town, cast your rod, and hope for the best! Fishing is a great way to pass time, make new friends, and earn some money!

** Hangout with friends! ** Head over to the Cafe or any of the other cool hangout spots to meet new friends and catch up with old ones!
